faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.content: Answers to your most common questions about our VIP transfer service.

faq1.question: What makes your VIP transfer service different?
faq1.answer: We offer a seamless, luxurious experience from booking to destination — with professional drivers, modern vehicles, and personalized service tailored to your comfort.

faq2.question: How can I book a transfer?
faq2.answer: You can book directly on our website in just a few steps: choose your route, choose your car and complete your reservation securely. You can visit the Guide page for step-by-step instructions.

faq3.question: Do you provide airport pickups and drop-offs?
faq3.answer: Yes, we specialize in airport transfers. Our drivers monitor flight status to ensure timely pickup, even in case of delays.

faq4.question: Is your service available 24/7?
faq4.answer: Yes, our VIP transfer services are available 24/7, including weekends and holidays — ensuring flexibility whenever you travel.

faq5.question: Can I book transfers for tours or multiple stops?
faq5.answer: Currently, we only support single point-to-point transfers. Tours or bookings with multiple stops are not available at this time.

faq6.question: Is payment secure on your website?
faq6.answer: Yes, our website uses secure SSL encryption and trusted payment gateways to ensure the safety of your personal and financial information.

faq7.question: Do the vehicles have air conditioning?
faq7.answer: Yes, all our VIP vehicles are fully air-conditioned to ensure maximum comfort throughout your journey.

faq8.question: Can I listen to music during the ride?
faq8.answer: Absolutely. Our vehicles are equipped with premium audio systems. You're welcome to request your favorite music or connect your device via Bluetooth.

faq9.question: Are your drivers professional and licensed?
faq9.answer: Yes, all our drivers are licensed professionals with years of experience in VIP transport and excellent knowledge of local routes.

faq10.question: Can I request a child seat?
faq10.answer: Of course. Just mention your requirement during the booking process and we’ll provide an age-appropriate child seat of charge.

faq11.question: Is Wi-Fi available in the car?
faq11.answer: Many of our vehicles are equipped with Wi-Fi. If this is important to you, please mention it during booking and we will do our best to accommodate.

faq12.question: What if my flight is delayed?
faq12.answer: Our team tracks flight statuses in real time. Even if your flight is delayed, your driver will be there when you land — at no extra charge.

faq13.question: Can I cancel or change my booking?
faq13.answer: Yes, bookings can be modified or canceled based on our cancellation policy. Just contact us via email or WhatsApp as soon as possible.

faq14.question: Do you offer services outside the city or for long-distance travel?
faq14.answer: Yes, we offer long-distance and intercity transfers. Let us know your destination and we’ll arrange everything for you.
